text: John Odin Wentworth Watson (born 25 January 1937) is an Australian politician. He was a member of the Liberal Party. He served as a Senator for Tasmania from 1978 to 2008. From July 2005 until he left parliament in June 2008, he was "the Father of the Senate." Watson was born in Launceston, Tasmania. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Liberal Party of Australia politicians Category:Members of the Australian Senate Category:Order of Australia Category:Politicians from Launceston, Tasmania
title: John Watson (Australian politician)
